title: Hydrogen Europe
author: Hydrogen Europe
text: Research shows H2-reduced iron superior 12 October 2022 Belgian PM unveils H2 strategy revision 18 October 2022 In June 2022, the European Parliament and the Council adopted their positions on the revision proposal of the EU ETS and the proposal for a Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM). In this paper, we dive into the institutions’ respective positions, consider the implications for the industry, and formulate policy recommendations in the context of ongoing trilogues on both files.
